alert.note: Alert for Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:36PM EST until January 10 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 5 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central, northeast, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 5 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop late Tuesday afternoon and become heavy at times through midnight before changing to rain during the pre-dawn hours Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
